name: Mortal Kombat 3
overview: Get ready for the fight of your life! 14 Selectable Fighters - including 8 new characters, 2 new bosses and 1 fighter hidden within the game! Watch out for this dude! 32 Megs - the most ever for a Mortal Kombat game! 12 new 3D rendered moving backgrounds to keep you jumping. Secret portals that allow you to smash up and down into different backgrounds for the ultimate bi-level battlefield! More fatalities, animalities and babalities! Intense, live-action, fully-digitized fight sequences for the most realistic action you've ever encountered!
